Text: TPB seems to be having some issues and not allowing me to seed - so please be patient. Will seed as soon as this blasted thing works
You're right on the ball this week @raymond_u - thank you for keeping us up to date with happenings in the motor sport world!
Seems that the new cloud-based TPB system is slowing down seeds a bit? I'm only managing to seed at something like 40KB/s. Please be patient... I'm seeding as hard as I can! I'll leave it on.
Many thanks. It's going like a TGV now.
